name: quarantine ME B Demo
detailed_description:
quarantine ME path F demo

This demo will travel you straight from Day2 to Day5 and features Path B, one of 12 psychological routes planned for the full version.
It focuses on themes of productivity, sustainability, and consumption.

Even in this limited route, there are nearly 15 distinct endings, determined by how you interact with the world and respond to its inhabitants.
The full game will contain 100+ outcomes, each reflecting a different facet of human nature.

Key Features:

  • A personality test disguised as a game

  • Branching dialogues and meaningful choices

  • 100+ psychological outcomes (15 in this demo)

  • One-man development with original soundtrack

  • A game that watches you back

A slow game for fast minds. A mirror, not a distraction.

short_description: Quarantine ME is a projective personality test disguised as a video game. Explore freely, interact with furniture, make choices in dialogues, and receive personalized feedback on your playstyle and personality. FIND YOURSELF!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: One with OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: One with OpenGL support
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
